message.content:
cs.IR, cs.HC, cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.DB. 

The paper is about Mobile Information Retrieval (Mobile IR), which is a subfield of Information Retrieval (IR). Therefore, cs.IR is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses user interface design and context awareness, which are related to Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC) and Natural Language Processing (cs.CL), respectively. The paper mentions the use of machine learning techniques for Mobile IR, which falls under Deep Learning (cs.DL) and the use of document collections, which is related to Database (cs.DB).
